ClassDesc: This class inflates scenes and transitions from resource files. Information on XML resource descriptions for transitions can be found for @B_android#R#styleable#Transition_E@, @B_android#R#styleable#TransitionSet_E@, @B_android#R#styleable#TransitionTarget_E@, @B_android#R#styleable#Fade_E@, and @B_android#R#styleable#TransitionManager_E@.
